physics

Class Physics2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • physics.Physics2D

  • public class Physics2D
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to calculate the physics of an Agent in a 2D Environment

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Physics2D(double x, double y, double maxSpeed, double maxForce)
      The constructor of the class The maximum speed is typically the amount of pixels a vehicle can cross per update and should be greater than 0 The maximum force should be between 0(cant accelerate) and 1(instant acceleration)
      Physics2D(Physics2D physics2D)
      Copy constructor to replicate the state of an agent perfectly
      Physics2D(Physics2D physics2D, double maxSpeed, double maxForce)
      The constructor of the class The maximum speed is typically the amount of pixels a vehicle can cross per update and should be greater than 0 The maximum force should be between 0(cant accelerate) and 1(instant acceleration)
      Physics2D(Vector2D location, double maxSpeed, double maxForce)
      The constructor of the class The maximum speed is typically the amount of pixels a vehicle can cross per update and should be greater than 0 The maximum force should be between 0(cant accelerate) and 1(instant acceleration)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Physics2D

        public Physics2D(double x,
                 double y,
                 double maxSpeed,
                 double maxForce)
        The constructor of the class The maximum speed is typically the amount of pixels a vehicle can cross per update and should be greater than 0 The maximum force should be between 0(cant accelerate) and 1(instant acceleration)
        Parameters:
        x - The starting x position of the agent
        y - The starting y position of the agent
        maxSpeed - The maximum speed the agent can achieve
        maxForce - The maximum force with which the agent can change its velocity

      • Physics2D

        public Physics2D(Physics2D physics2D,
                 double maxSpeed,
                 double maxForce)
        The constructor of the class The maximum speed is typically the amount of pixels a vehicle can cross per update and should be greater than 0 The maximum force should be between 0(cant accelerate) and 1(instant acceleration)
        Parameters:
        physics2D - A Template Physics object from which the agent will copy the current location
        maxSpeed - The maximum speed the agent can achieve
        maxForce - The maximum force with which the agent can change its velocity
